summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, detailing various account types and requirements for establishing a banking relationship. It includes information on joint accounts, customer identification policies, and compliance responsibilities for non-US individuals and organizations.
keyFacts: The document outlines the requirements for opening various types of accounts, including checking and money market accounts.
It emphasizes the importance of customer identification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
There are specific obligations for non-US individuals and organizations regarding tax and compliance responsibilities.
The document includes terms related to joint accounts and the rights of account holders.
There are references to the need for clients to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
